column2: # lots of the responses are repeated, so just get the unique entries
"I have 3 main points against:  1. Joe Biden isn't Donald Trumps opponent.  2. We can read his mind.  3. Theyve always been trying to impeach"
"I think that it is justified and he should have been impeached, there seems to be something terribly wrong with the justice system."
"I think that they are somewhat true, but there is no way the Senate will vote to fine Trump guilty"
"I think it is a big farce. Joe Biden isn't even the nominee yet, and he is not even leading in the polls. It doesn't make sense."
"It seems like one of many articles of impeachment that should exist. The facts and history seem to support all of the claims made here."
